p.ph: requires a Java Development Kit (JDK), version 7, 64 bit. Deployment with JDK 7, Update 45 has been tested and is recommended.

section.p: When operating in SAML_SP mode with a JDK higher than version 7, Update 45, we recommend you run each Web service client (e.g. APP and some other client) (e.g. the ROR integration software and some other client) (e.g. the AWS integration software and some other client) (e.g. the OpenStack integration software and some other client) (e.g. the TPS5 integration software and some other client) (e.g. the vSphere integration software and some other client) in a separate domain. Otherwise, problems with Web service calls may occur.
Due to a CORBA library change which is incompatible with Oracle GlassFish Server version 3.1.2.2, deployment with JDK 7, Update 55 and higher is not supported.

In order to be able to execute the installation scripts, you need to install the Apache Ant 1.8 (or higher) open source software. In the subsequent sections, <ANT_HOME> is the installation directory of Apache Ant.
